item.title: XR
item.description: Please register to our experiment Duration approximately 1h. Payment 12 € + 3 € Bonus. Make three purchase decisions in a VR shopping environment. https://experimente.wirtschaft.uni-giessen.de/home/referral?ref=yEalQN0Cdk1rfQ Mozilla Hubs Experimente Lernräume Stickstoff Patrik Alter Raum Stickstoff {:target="_blank"} Neuer Raum Stickstoff Patrik{:target="_blank"} Fragebogen Patrik{:target="_blank"} Lernräume Colin Raum A{:target="_blank"} Raum B{:target="_blank"} Colin Fragebogen{:target="_blank"} Xiaowen Lernräume Raum A{:target="_blank"} Raum B{:target="_blank"} Xiaowen Fragebogen{:target="_blank"} Bitcoin Proof of work vs. Proof of stake https://hub.link/Ko49mHj Non-fungible Tokens (NFTs) https://hub.link/7D8bTwT
